import React, { useEffect , useState } from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BiChevronLeft, BiChevronsRight } from "react-icons/bi"; import briefcaseIcon from "../../Assests/Images/icon/briefcase.svg"; import Heading from "../Heading"; function User() { const [pendingNum, setPendingNum] = useState(0); const [shortlistedNum, setShortlistedNum] = useState(0); const [hiredNum, setHiredNum] = useState(0); const [rejectNum, setRejectNum] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/dashboard/applicationNum`, { headers: { accessToken: localStorage.getItem("accessToken"), }, } ).then( (response) => { setPendingNum(response.data[0][0].pendingNum); setRejectNum(response.data[1][0].rejectNum); setHiredNum(response.data[2][0].hiredNum); setShortlistedNum(response.data[3][0].shortlistedNum); } ); }, []); return (

{shortlistedNum}
